S

setAdapter(SwipesAdapter) - Method in class com.operators.swipes.SwipesView
Sets the adapter that provides the data and the views to represent the data in this widget.
setAllowedDirections(SwipesView.Directions...) - Method in class com.operators.swipes.SwipesView
Sets the horizontal and vertical swiping directions enabled, and can also be set in xml layout via the "directions" property.
setMaxVisibleCards(int) - Method in class com.operators.swipes.SwipesView
Sets the maximum number of visible cards (defaults to 3), and can also be set in xml layout via the "max_visible_cards" property.
setSelection(int) - Method in class com.operators.swipes.SwipesView
Sets the currently selected item.
setSwipeRotation(float) - Method in class com.operators.swipes.SwipesView
Sets the degree rotation for the swiping action, and can also be set in xml layout via the "swipe_rotation" property.
setSwipesListener(SwipesView.SwipesViewListener) - Method in class com.operators.swipes.SwipesView
The setter for Swipe Listener changes.
SwipesView - Class in com.operators.swipes
The Swipes View is an implementation of Android's AdapterView for 4 directional swiping (based loosely upon Tinder's Like/Nope Swiping action).
SwipesView(Context) - Constructor for class com.operators.swipes.SwipesView
 
SwipesView(Context, AttributeSet) - Constructor for class com.operators.swipes.SwipesView
 
SwipesView(Context, AttributeSet, int) - Constructor for class com.operators.swipes.SwipesView
 
SwipesView.Directions - Enum in com.operators.swipes
The Swipes View Directions are abstractions of typical 4 directional fling operations.
SwipesView.SwipesViewListener - Interface in com.operators.swipes
Swipes View Listener that updates on swipe threshold and direction.
